text: Hagi 3'a kevufintira mago kevu vahe'mofona agatonto zamo'ene krimo'ene zamazeri haviza hanige'za Jerusalemi kuma agu'afi frigahaze. Hagi mago kevu vahera kumamofo megia ha' vahe'mo'za kazinteti zamahe frigahaze. Hagi mago kevu vahera zamahe panani hanenke'za mago mago hu'za vahe kumatega vu'za e'za hanagena, ha' vahe huzmanta'nena bainati kazinteti zmarotago hu'za zamahegahaze.
